title: Chapter 1843 - Blood-Stained Robes
body:
Chapter 1843 - Blood-Stained Robes

He wouldn’t mind teaching Su Yi a lesson? Fan Zhui felt a massive weight lift from his shoulders. That’s fine. All’s good so long as they don’t fight to the death.

But against all expectations, Xi Ning laughed coldly. “I urge you to take that back.”

Luo Tiandu said with exasperation, “A’Ning, Qing Wu told me that Fellow Daoist Su is incomparably heaven-defying and that he can suppress Great Martial Stage experts, but that doesn’t mean you can look down on me, does it?”

He suddenly moved several hundred feet back, his eyes glinting like knives, and locked onto the distant Su Yi. “I’ve always said what’s on my mind, even when it’s grating to the ears, and I’ve always disdained resorting to mental games. Let’s fight! I said I’d just teach you a little lesson, so I promise not to kill you!”

Boom!

His sleeves billowed around him, and his entire body surged with electric light. He stood in the air, lotuses silently condensing out of lightning beneath his feet.

He’d obviously suppressed his power down to the Great Martial Stage, but his terrifying majesty was greater than even a Great Unity Stage cultivator like Fan Zhui!

Su Yi’s eyes shone with a hint of strange light. It...
